        int getConsentScreen()
        Returns:
        the screen number in the CMP where consent was given

        java.lang.String getConsentLanguage()
        Returns:
        the two-letter ISO639-1 language code that CMP asked for consent in

      • getVendorListVersion

        int getVendorListVersion()
        Returns:
        version of vendor list used in most recent consent string update.

      • getAllowedPurposeIds

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getAllowedPurposeIds()
        Returns:
        the set of purpose id's which are permitted according to this consent string

      • getAllowedPurposes

        java.util.Set<Purpose> getAllowedPurposes()
        Returns:
        the set of allowed purposes which are permitted according to this consent string

      • getAllowedPurposesBits

        int getAllowedPurposesBits()
        Returns:
        an integer equivalent of allowed purpose id bits according to this consent string

      • getAllowedVendorIds

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getAllowedVendorIds()
        Returns:
        the set of allowed vendor id's which are permitted according to this consent string

      • getMaxVendorId

        int getMaxVendorId()
        Returns:
        the maximum VendorId for which consent values are given.

      • isVendorAllowed

        boolean isVendorAllowed(int vendorId)
        Check whether vendor with specified ID is allowd
        Parameters:

        Returns:
